metadata.job_location: Las Condes, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile

seniority_level.evidence: 5+ years experience required plus mentoring junior engineers and reviewing their work indicates senior level

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer, core responsibilities focus on building data pipelines, data integration, and data modeling

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on data pipelines for collecting data from multiple sources, data consolidation and structuring suggests batch ETL work

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions providing guidance and mentorship to junior data engineers and reviewing their implementations, but no direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: Google Cloud Platform mentioned explicitly multiple times as primary focus, with knowledge of other cloud environments as nice-to-have

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only mentions GCP as primary, other cloud environments listed as nice-to-have but not specified

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on data pipelines for collecting data from multiple sources and systems suggests batch processing patterns

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned in job description

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data storage technologies mentioned, focus is on data pipelines and processing

remote_restriction.evidence: On-site work model required in Las Condes, Santiago, Chile - specific country restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Las Condes, Santiago, Chile with regional team mention suggests Chile-focused timezone

relocation_required.evidence: On-site requirement in Las Condes implies relocation needed if not already in Santiago area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, position is in Chile so H1B not applicable

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Position in Chile, student visa programs like OPT/CPT are US-specific

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, standard work authorization would apply for Chile

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position suggests employee status (W2 equivalent in Chile)

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth or advancement paths mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly mentions providing guidance and mentorship to junior data engineers

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks or paths mentioned in job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (Python, SQL, GCP) and nice-to-have (financial market, regional experience)

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific responsibilities and clear skill requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills and requirements are appropriate for senior data engineer level with 5+ years experience
